attributes.action: Ask Transport for London to Renew Uber's Operator Licence.
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament should discuss this at the earliest

https://tfl.gov.uk/info-for/media/press-releases/2017/september/licensing-decision-on-uber-london-limited?intcmp=50167
attributes.background: Transport for London has refused to renew Uber's Operator Licence resulting in 40K Uber Drivers facing financial ruin and deriving choice for passengers. TfL's decision is arbitary without consulting any drivers or passengers.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
